A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I signed up for this website just so I could review and let people know how BAD this movie is. I love star wars\, and this officially RUINED the trilogy. It was no actor's fault; whoever directed and wrote the script for this movie (Rian Johnson?) is to blame.

I won't spoil anything\, but man\, this movie was bad. So many plot holes\, and too much attempt at comedy\, when it's a star wars movie\, and should have depth and seriousness like episodes 1-6 (especially 4-6). There are many other things as well\, but I don't wanna ruin anything.

Anyway\, don't waste your time watching it. This trilogy is over.
